get.description: Generates an Excel file for applications filtered by tracker, type, start date, and end date.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of application (e.g., admission, verification).

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for filtering applications (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for filtering applications (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

data.description: Path to the generated Excel file.

400.description: No data found for the given filters.

get.description: Generates an Excel file for payment-related application data filtered by tracker, type, start date, and end date.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of application (e.g., payment, verification).

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date for filtering applications (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date for filtering applications (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

data.description: Path to the generated Excel file.

400.description: No data found for the given filters.

get.description: Combines multiple user certificates into a single PDF based on the verification types selected by the user.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: The application ID associated with the user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user.

data.description: The URL to the merged certificate PDF.

get.description: Provides the functionality to download a PDF document from the specified file path.

parameters.name: documentFile
parameters.description: The file path of the document to be downloaded.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid document file path.

message.example: Document not found at the specified path.

get.description: Fetch details of a document, including its file extension and file source URL, based on the file name and user ID.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The name of the file to fetch details for.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID associated with the document.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid query parameters.

message.example: Invalid file name or user ID.

post.description: Restores an application from rejected status to pending and updates the tracker and status.

appl_id.description: The ID of the application to be restored.

user_id.description: The ID of the user performing the action.

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of students who have completed their payment, with optional filters.

post.description: Allows an admin to reset the password of a user by email.

email.description: Email of the user whose password needs to be reset

message.example: Something went wrong while changing your Password

post.description: Allows a user to change their profile details such as name, email, mobile number, and marksheet name.

data.description: User's ID (the ID of the user to be updated)

get.description: Generates serial numbers for a given user and application ID based on verification type.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

message.example: An error occurred while generating serial numbers.

get.description: Merges all documents for a specified user and application into a single PDF file.

data.description: URL of the merged PDF document.

400.description: Bad Request - Unable to merge files.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request.

post.description: Generates a payment receipt for a user based on their application ID and payment details.

app_id.description: ID of the application for which the payment receipt is generated.

data.description: URL or file name of the generated payment receipt.

400.description: Bad Request - Failed to generate the payment receipt.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request.

delete.description: Deletes a document (educational or institute details) based on its ID and type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of document to delete ('edu_details' or 'Ins_details').

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the document to be deleted.

400.description: Bad Request - Document not found or invalid parameters.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

get.description: Retrieves supportive documents for the authenticated user with a null application ID.

400.description: Bad Request - Failed to retrieve supportive documents.

get.description: Fetch all supportive document data for a user where `app_id` is null and type is 'supportive'.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose supportive data is to be retrieved.

400.description: Bad Request - Failed to retrieve supportive data.

post.description: Updates the details of a student based on their user ID.

user_id.description: The ID of the user whose details are to be updated.

firstName.description: The first name of the student.

lastName.description: The last name of the student.

fullName.description: The full name of the student.

email.description: The email address of the student.

mobile.description: The mobile number of the student.

400.description: Bad Request - Data not updated or invalid input.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

post.summary: Update or create verification types for a user
post.description: This API updates existing verification types or creates new ones based on the input data.

documentCount.description: Number of documents provided for this verification type.

200.description: Successful update or creation of verification types.

data.description: Updated or newly created verification type details.

400.description: Failed to update or create verification types.
